Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I've lurked in the forums long enough but only recently created an account. I hadn't said 'Hi' and for that I'm sorry so hello to all

I got KSP back in January 2013, really enjoyed it but failed miserably initially. As many after watching some youtube videos (possibly by some of you) I learned a lot more about the science involved in space travel and manoeuvring and this gave me a boost to want to play more. Fast forward to today and I'm still no expert but am loving every new update and the fantastic MODs the community creates for us to use and play with.

I started streaming KSP some months ago and this also really helped me improve thanks to all the helpful hints, tips and suggestions the viewers from the community suggested.

I'm very proud to have been chosen to stream for KSP TV and am looking forward to meeting more of you over the months to come. I may also rely heavily on yuo to help me finally get to places like Jool and Eeloo, something I've still not accomplished yet. You can blame Squad for releasing great new additions like the Science and now the Contracts, which makes me reboot my career saves.

Oops this ended up being a far longer intro that I intended

N1tch

Edited August 14, 2014 by N1tch

Haha ya might...

BUT anyway, I am joshwoo69 A "bit" fairly known for my youtube, posts and a stream watcher. I also will be chilling out with both kofeyh and you In particular

And !oops command for your you

Edited August 14, 2014 by Joshwoo69

Haha your profile pic made me laugh

So, if I understood it correctly, you want to get active on the forum, right? Welcome!

Have fun
